headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK): Valuation Check After Rapid S&P and Russell Index Shuffles
summary: Mohawk Industries (MHK) has been on an index rollercoaster this month, getting dropped from the S&P 500 Equal Weighted index, then quickly added to both the S&P 1000 and Russell Small Cap Value Index. See our latest analysis for Mohawk Industries. Those rapid index shifts have put Mohawk back on traders’ radar, with index-linked buying helping to steady the share price around $110.03. This comes even as its 90-day share price return of minus 12.36 percent contrasts with a stronger three-year...
